text: Tomáš Harant (born April 28, 1980) is a Slovak professional ice hockey player. He is currently a free agent having last played for MsHK Zilina in the Slovak Extraliga. Harant was drafted in the sixth-round of the 2000 NHL Entry Draft, 173rd overall by the Nashville Predators. Harant made his Czech Extraliga debut playing with HC Oceláři Třinec during the 2000-01 Czech Extraliga season. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:HC Oceláři Třinec players Category:MsHK Žilina players Category:AZ Havířov players Category:HC Dynamo Moscow players Category:HC Karlovy Vary players Category:Motor České Budějovice players Category:Lowell Devils players Category:Mora IK players Category:HC Bílí Tygři Liberec players Category:Stadion Hradec Králové players Category:Piráti Chomutov players Category:Czech ice hockey defencemen Category:Sportspeople from Žilina Category:Nashville Predators draft picks
title: Tomáš Harant
